original_text: Sisera called out all his chariots, 900 chariots of iron, and all the men who were with him, from Harosheth-hagoyim to the river Kishon.
korean_text: 시스라가 모든 병거 곧 철 병거 구백 대와 자기와 함께 있는 모든 백성을 하로셋학고임에서부터 기손 강으로 모은지라

sentences.original_text: Sisera called out all his chariots
and all the men who were with him
from Harosheth-hagoyim to the river Kishon
